title: Oh, for f*ck's sake...

embed.description: Xayah, You are cordially-no! Wait-romantically invited on a date with me by the Aphae waterfall. There will be mood lighting. Swans (SWANS!). And magic. Always magic. Would you give me the honour of the first dance tonight? Your sweetheart, Rakan P.S. - I love you! P.P.S. - Bring chocolate.

body: F*ck you, Rito, right where the sun don't shine...

replies.body:
Either you're new here or you don't know much about me. Allow me to explain:
Xayah is my favourite champion (used to be Quinn for a very long time, but that all changed the moment I found Xayah). Considering that, I can't help but feel obliged to have everything Xayah (as I did [and still do, actually] with Quinn). That said, I very much dislike the direction Riot is going in and don't feel like spending anything on LoL.

You can imagine the bind this puts me in, right?

dude welcome to my life. i have camille,trynd,kled,xayah,rakan,warwick,sej,kayn,taliyah and if an awesome skin comes out i feel the need to send it to my friends that main that champ. i always complain about this game being shit now but still reach into my pocket and fund it
Riot making skins for Valentine's Day, but nothing for the equally important Singles' Appreciation Day.
ye they should've made sweetheart rengar and khazix
xD Kha'Zix with the isolation damage lol

> [{quoted}](name=Evelynnie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LbzJ93sp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-13T03:19:11.812+0000)
>
> Riot making skins for Valentine's Day, but nothing for the equally important Singles' Appreciation Day.

That's just petty. People really do need to get over themselves.

lol, I only buy skin via self-mystery-gifting... 

The randomness of skins I get is beyond my control, be ugly, beautiful, like or not, it goes into my collection
